subject: Follow up: Project Proposal
body: Reminder to follow up on the project proposal you sent last week. Check if the client has reviewed it.

subject: Your subscription renews in 3 days
body:
Hi Asneem,

Your Netflix subscription will automatically renew on December 6th, 2025.

Amount: $15.99/month

No action needed if you wish to continue.

Netflix Team

subject: Book Return Reminder - Due Dec 5
body:
Dear Student,

This is a reminder that the following book is due for return:

- 'Machine Learning: A Probabilistic Perspective'

Due Date: December 5, 2025

Please return or renew to avoid late fees.

subject: Early Bird Registration Ends Soon!
body:
Don't miss out!

Early bird pricing for Tech Conference 2025 ends on December 10th.

Register now and save 40%!

Date: January 15-17, 2025
Location: San Francisco, CA
